explanation: There is a mix of opinions, but notable bullish comments include expectations of liquidity being taken at higher levels (112k, 114k), higher highs predicted, and some technical patterns (e.g., retest, breakout, raising wedge on higher TFs) suggesting upward momentum. However, several users noted risks, possible traps, and sideways movement, tempering confidence.
